title: AI is coming for these jobs next, but experts say others are surprisingly safe - is yours's protected
description: Artificial Intelligence is rapidly reshaping the job market. Some jobs requiring empathy, judgment, and physical skills are safe. Roles involving repetitive tasks face automation risks. Healthcare, law, and skilled trades remain secure. However, transcription and scheduling jobs are vulnerable. The future workforce will see humans partnering with AI. Companies must strategically invest in their workforce.
content:

title: Hollywood star 'terrified' by AI and warns of 'very chilling things'
description: David Tennant has revealed he is “terrified” about the impact artificial intelligence will have on the television industry and said it feels 'horribly inevitable' that it'll lead to job losses
content:

title: Cybercrime explained: Fortinet talks about billions of threats a day, amped by AI
description: Artificial intelligence has made cybercrime a growth business, on an exponential scale, and the Burnaby office of Fortinet is on front-line.
content:
Article content
The “threat map” that greets you at reception of cybersecurity firm Fortinet’s Metro Vancouver hub is the easiest illustration for the layperson of cybercrime’s explosive growth.

title: vivo Shines with Dual Honors: No.34 on BrandZ Top 100 and "2025 Kantar BrandZ Inspirational Star of Innovation" Award
description: SHANGHAI, Sept. 22, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- At the 2025 Kantar BrandZ China Gala, themed 'Neo Intelligence Brand Power' and held in Shanghai, vivo ranked 34th on the BrandZ Top 100 list for the second year in a row, with a brand value of USD 5.989 billion, marking steady growth from the previous year. Thanks to its continuous innovation in areas such as 5G communications, artificial intelligence, and mobile imaging, vivo also received the '2025 Kantar BrandZ Inspirational Star of Innovation' Award, once again highlighting its industry-leading innovation capabilities.
content: SHANGHAI, Sept. 22, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- At the 2025 Kantar BrandZ China Gala, themed "Neo Intelligence Brand Power" and held in Shanghai, vivo ranked 34th on the BrandZ Top 100 list for the second year in a row, with a brand value of USD 5.989 billi... [3391 chars]

title: Cru Uncorked tests sommeliers against AI; guess who won?
description: Human wine experts defeated artificial intelligence in a blind tasting event, though guests admitted using AI when sommeliers aren't available.
content:
MORELAND HILLS, Ohio – Humans beat AI in a four-course wine pairing competition Sept. 11 at Cru Uncorked. The results imply, perhaps, that consumers aren’t ready for robots to choose their wines.

title: Meta’s AI Llama approved for use by U.S. gov. agencies
description: U.S. government agencies will be able to use Meta Platforms’ artificial intelligence system Llama, a senior administration official said, as the Trump administration pushes to integrate commercial AI tools into government operations.

title: Research paves way for personalized TMS to aid smokers
description: Science and artificial intelligence combined at the Medical University of South Carolina in a study that could lead to personalized repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation, or rTMS, for smokers who want to quit.
content:
